thread.title: Spurrier resigns, takes blame for South Carolina's slide
thread.title_full: Spurrier resigns, takes blame for South Carolina's slide

title: Spurrier resigns, takes blame for South Carolina's slide
text:
> Sports Spurrier resigns, takes blame for South Carolina's slide South Carolina's new interim head coach Sean Elliott speaks during a news conference after Steve Spurrier announced he was resigning on Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, at the University Of South Carolina, in Columbia, S.C. Steve Spurrier said he made the decision to resign as head coach because the team was heading in the wrong direction. (AP Photo/Richard Shiro) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
